meanings.definition: The quality or state of being scruffy.
meanings.sent1: Her scruffinesses made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The scruffinesses of his clothes showed he had been working hard.
meanings.sent3: Despite her scruffinesses, she always had a smile on her face.
meanings.sent4: The scruffinesses of the old building gave it a charming character.
meanings.sent5: The scruffinesses of the stray dog made it endearing to everyone.

meanings.definition: The appearance of being untidy or unkempt.
meanings.sent1: The scruffinesses of the room indicated a lack of cleaning.
meanings.sent2: His scruffinesses were a result of a busy day at work.
meanings.sent3: The scruffinesses of his hair made him look like a mad scientist.
meanings.sent4: The scruffinesses of the garden gave it a wild and natural look.
meanings.sent5: The scruffinesses of her handwriting made it hard to read.
